choose.otherwise: order by t.approvedate DESC , t.ID DESC

mapper.select:
select count(t.id) from base_file_uploadtemp t LEFT JOIN base_file_dirfile t2 ON t.APPROVEFILEID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN base_file t3 ON t2.FILEID=t3.ID
LEFT JOIN base_org_virtual t4 ON CONCAT(";",t.ORGIDS,";") like CONCAT("%;",t4.ID,";%")

select
,t4.id as orgid from base_file_uploadtemp t LEFT JOIN base_file_dirfile t2 ON t.APPROVEFILEID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN base_file t3 ON t2.FILEID=t3.ID
LEFT JOIN base_org_virtual t4 ON CONCAT(";",t.ORGIDS,";") like CONCAT("%;",t4.ID,";%")

select
from base_file_uploadtemp t LEFT JOIN base_file_dirfile t2 ON t.APPROVEFILEID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN base_file t3 ON t2.FILEID=t3.ID where t.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: update base_file_uploadtemp set delflag=1 where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:

ID,
ORGIDS,
APPROVENUM,

APPROVEDATE,
FILESOURCE,
THIRDDOCID,
FILERELATED,
FILETYPE,

CREATETIME,
UPDATEUSER,
UPDATETIME,
DELFLAG,

mapper.update:
update base_file_uploadtemp
ORGIDS = #{orgids,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVENUM = #{approvenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVEFILEID = #{approvefileid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FILENAME = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEYWORD = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVEDATE = #{approvedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILESOURCE = #{filesource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
THIRDDOCID = #{thirddocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILERELATED = #{filerelated,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FILETYPE = #{filetype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELFLAG = #{delflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update base_file_uploadtemp set ORGIDS = #{orgids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVENUM = #{approvenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVEFILEID = #{approvefileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FILENAME = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORD = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVEDATE = #{approvedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILESOURCE = #{filesource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, THIRDDOCID = #{thirddocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILERELATED = #{filerelated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FILETYPE = #{filetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELFLAG = #{delflag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
